channel.title: Galinthias 718 Rsps 2015 server Grandexchange eco Unique
channel.description:
Before i continue i know alot of you are looking at this and thinking oh another 718 that's going to die and not bother doing anything well that's not true we are currently working very hard to ensure everything is running tip top shape! and our Team are and will continue to maintain this! Enjoy hope to see you soon!
** FEATURES **
- Drygore's - Custom Items - Double xp Weekends - Clan Chat - Friends Chat - Squeal of Fortune - Bank Pins - Fully working combat system. - Alot of mini games - Alot of bosses ( more being added ) - PVP ( player vs player ) - Fully working bank tabs - Custom mini game being added at moment - PVP rewards and title's - Vps hosted - Domain - Dedicated staff team - Suggestions are talked between server and staff befoure implements to keep the players happy - ECO server so don't expect to join and get a godsword or torva ect easily! - Challenging slayer tasks and events - Regular events and random events - All 25 skills! - Auto vote - Auto donate - Random loot drop on some tasks - Prestige - Dicing - 3 Slayer Masters - Crystal key chest and making - GodSword Creating - Clue Scroll System - Unique donator zone - Grand Exchange - Duel all dupes fixed - Anti dupe system - Full screen - HD graphics - Perfect lending system -Donator pets, -Donator bonus xp Added !!! -Well of good fortune added for double drops -Donator pets -Squeal of Fortune 100% -100% soul wars With Rewards
Download Link: http://www.mediafire.com/download/sksg2see07gkkio/Galinthias.jar http://lightninx.co.uk
